meanings.definition: Beyond the visible spectrum at the red end.
meanings.sent1: The ultrared light was too faint for human eyes to see.
meanings.sent2: The sky turned a beautiful ultrared color as the sun set.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fur glowed ultrared under the special light.
meanings.sent4: Her anger burned ultrared, visible in her flushed cheeks.
meanings.sent5: The ultrared glow of the lava was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A color beyond the visible spectrum at the red end.
meanings.sent1: The artist mixed red and orange to create an ultrared.
meanings.sent2: The ultrared of the flower stood out among the greens and blues.
meanings.sent3: The ultrared of the sunset painted the sky in a magical hue.
meanings.sent4: The ultrared of the gemstone was rare and precious.
meanings.sent5: The ultrared of the cardinal's feathers was striking against the snow.

meanings.sent1: The ultrared lamp bathed the room in a warm glow.
meanings.sent2: The ultrared camera captured images beyond what the eye could see.
meanings.sent3: The ultrared mirror made everything look surreal.
meanings.sent4: The ultrared heat from the fire kept them warm on the cold night.
meanings.sent5: The ultrared glow of the fireflies lit up the night.
